meta_description: Professional portfolio - Back-End Developer and offensive security specialist
hero_description: 3rd year High School student and Systems Development Technician. Founder of BLACK ANGS - Offensive Security Consulting and Red Team.
about_subtitle: Learn a little more about my journey
about_text: I'm a Back-End Developer and Pentester, 3rd year High School student and Systems Development Technician. Founder of BLACK ANGS, an offensive security consulting company participating in the Cyoris Pre-Incubator (Univille). Member of OWASP Belo Horizonte and volunteer at Formming Hackers community.
skills_subtitle: Languages, tools and systems I master
articles_subtitle: Content I've written about technology and security
quiz_subtitle: Test your knowledge in information security
contact_subtitle: Let's work together? Get in touch!
footer_made: Made with PHP, HTML, CSS and JS
exp_blackangs_desc: Offensive Security Consulting company and Red Team activities. Participant in the Cyoris Pre-Incubator (Univille). Company created during ACISBS event - Entrepreneurial Generation.
exp_owasp_desc: Active member of the OWASP Belo Horizonte chapter, contributing to the web application security community in Brazil.
exp_formming_desc: Volunteer in the Formming Hackers community, supporting the dissemination of knowledge in cybersecurity and ethical hacking.
exp_cedup_desc: High School integrated with Systems Development Technician course.
project_idor_title: IDOR in API + Broken Access Control
project_idor_desc: Practical and educational demonstration of IDOR (Insecure Direct Object References) vulnerabilities in REST APIs combined with Broken Access Control flaws. The project exemplifies how these vulnerabilities can be exploited and includes recommended OWASP Top 10 mitigations.
project_portfolio_desc: Personal portfolio developed with PHP, HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript. Internationalization system (i18n) with support for 4 languages, light/dark theme, interactive cybersecurity quiz and responsive design.
article_jammers_desc_pt: An in-depth analysis of signal jamming devices (jammers), exploring how they work, their security impacts and the legal implications of their use in the Brazilian context.
article_jammers_desc_blackpacket: Article published on The Black Packet blog about jammers, exploring their use in Red Team scenarios, wireless penetration testing and security countermeasures.
article_jammers_desc_en: A comprehensive analysis of signal jamming devices, exploring how they work, their security implications, and the legal aspects of their use in cybersecurity contexts.
quiz_cta_description: Test your cybersecurity skills with our interactive quiz. Questions about OWASP Top 10, pentest techniques, network security and more!
